Exceptions¶

exception djangorpc.exceptions.BaseRpcException[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Base exception.

exception djangorpc.exceptions.RpcExceptionEvent[source]¶

Bases: djangorpc.exceptions.BaseRpcException

This exception is sent to server as Ext.Direct.ExceptionEvent. So we can handle it in client and show pretty message for user. Example:

class MainApiClass(object):

    def func2(self, user):
        if not user.is_authenticated():
            raise RpcExceptionEvent(u'Permission denied.')

And you can catch this with:

jQuery.Rpc.on('exception', function(event){
    alert('ERROR: '+event.message);
});
